ReST Web GUI

A framework to create

  • web portals w/o programm coding
  • w/o application servers
  • descriptive web applications for REST/JSON type web services
All you need is a modern web browser and a web service somewhere. It takes only minutes to "develop" an new web app.

No application server (Tomcat, NodeJS, ...) is required to run the GUI -- you only need a web server (apache, nginx, ...).

It's on open source and on GitHub

Visit the GitHub "ReST Web GUI"" project and have a look at the docu. Copyright: MIT License
